pos_mean_info_list.mean: 增加，添加；补充说；计算…总和
蝰蛇（欧洲产的小毒蛇）；加算器；猪鼻蛇（北美产无毒的）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 作“附件”解时，与attachment同义，可互换，但还指增加美观的附属品。
主要指使书、报等正广更完善而额外增加的部分。
指用于扩大原物用途的附件。

word_group.brief_definition: 玻璃封装添加剂；玻璃封闭添加剂

bilingual.source: The addition of sugar made the coffee taste better.
bilingual.target: 增加糖使咖啡的味道更好。

bilingual.source: The addition of a second monitor improved my productivity.
bilingual.target: 增加第二个显示器提高了我的生产力。

bilingual.source: The addition of new features improved the software significantly.
bilingual.target: 新功能的增加显著提升了软件的性能。

bilingual.source: The addition of a garden to the house increased its value.
bilingual.target: 房子增加了一个花园，提升了它的价值。

bilingual.source: Asparagus is a great addition to any salad for extra crunch.
bilingual.target: 芦笋是任何沙拉中增加脆感的绝佳选择。

bilingual.source: The addition of a new member to the team was welcomed by everyone.
bilingual.target: 团队中新成员的增加受到了大家的欢迎。

bilingual.source: The addition of yttria can significantly increase the durability of the material.
bilingual.target: 添加氧化钇可以显著增加材料的耐久性。

bilingual.source: Addition They' They've just had an addition to the family.
bilingual.target: 他们家里刚又增加一口。又增加一口。

bilingual.source: Sound addition includes the gain or insertion of a sound.
bilingual.target: 语音增加包括增加一个音或嵌入一个音。

bilingual.source: Theyve just had an addition to the family.
bilingual.target: 他们家里刚又增加一口。

yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，我只是不由自主地想说"呼"。

yingyinNormal.en: In addition to intermittent outages, a considerable amount of havoc has been wreaked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 目前不仅信号断断续续，还引发了大规模的破坏。

yingyinNormal.en: In Massachusetts, nearly half the homes use gas for heating in addition to electricity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在马萨诸塞州，几乎一半家庭除了用电，就用天然气来取暖。

yingyinNormal.en: Excuse me? In addition, we stipulate to everything testified in Mr. Fornum's deposition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么? 另外，我们承认佛努姆先生案子里的一切证词。

yingyinNormal.en: And isn't it true that in addition to your Ground Floor status, you are a moderator on this site? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么根据你一楼楼主的地位，你是否也是这个网站的网管？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: In addition to all his other crops, he's an expert at producing Blooming Onions, 1,500 tons of them every year, precisely to his customer's specifications.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除了他种植的其他作物，他还是一位制作开花洋葱的专家，每年生产1500吨，完全按照消费者需求来生产的洋葱。

yingyinNormal.en: That doesn't seem likely. Her bed's of sturdy construction. Even the addition of a second normal size human being wouldn't cause a structural failure, much less a homunculus such as yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是不太可能的，她的床的构造很结实，就算多承重一个正常体型的人类也不会引致其床架松动的，更别提像你这样的小雏形人了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 另外的；附加的；额外的；更多的
n. 增加；加法；加；添加物；添置的人手

word_family.mean: v. 增加；添加；加起来；补充一句；进一步说

examination_example.sentence: But in <highlight>addition</highlight> to those trusted coworkers, you should expand your horizons and find out about all the people around you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但除了那些值得信任的同事，你还应该扩大自己的视野，了解周围的所有人。

examination_example.sentence: This will help to grow your internal network, in <highlight>addition</highlight> to being a nice break in the work day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将有助于扩大你的内部网络，同时也是你工作时的休息时间。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight>, new digital technologies have allowed more rapid trading of equities, quicker use of information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，新的数字技术使得股票交易更加迅速，信息的使用更加迅速。

examination_example.sentence: There's just one thing you should try to keep at least some time for, in <highlight>addition</highlight> to your writing—and that's reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了写作之外，只有一件事你应该至少花些时间去做，那就是阅读。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 另外的；附加的；额外的；更多的
n. 增加；加法；加；添加物；添置的人手

word_family.mean: v. 增加；添加；加起来；补充一句；进一步说

examination_example.sentence: What else could be done to reduce fatal road accidents in <highlight>addition</highlight> to safer roads?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了更安全的道路外，还可以采取什么措施来减少致命的道路事故？

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight>, pop stars or influential people have a duty to act as positive role models.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，流行明星或有影响力的人有义务充当积极的榜样。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight> to the likely negative long-term impact on sales, this verbal trick sends a message.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了可能对销售产生的长期负面影响之外，这种口头伎俩还传递了一个信息。

sense_info_list.en: a suburban area laid out in streets and lots for a future residential area

examination_example.sentence: But the <highlight>addition</highlight> of the bad option made people much more likely to choose more print plus digital option.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是不良选项的加入使得人们更有可能选择更多的印刷品加数字选项。

examination_example.sentence: On the demand side, those trends include the ongoing <highlight>addition</highlight> of more than 70 million people a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在需求方面，这些趋势包括每年持续新增7000多万人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight>, most newspapers had little in them that would appeal to a mass audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，大多数报纸几乎没有吸引大众的内容。

examination_example.sentence: Our café offers a complete menu of lunch and snack options, in <highlight>addition</highlight> to seasonal specials.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的咖啡馆提供全套完整的午餐和小吃可供选择，还有季节性特色菜。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 另外的；附加的；额外的；更多的
n. 增加；加法；加；添加物；添置的人手

word_family.mean: v. 增加；添加；加起来；补充一句；进一步说

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight>, during the festival, people make and eat Zongzi.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，在节日期间，人们会包粽子，吃粽子。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight>, information you get from newspapers is usually official and true.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，你从报纸上获得的信息通常是官方的和真实的。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight>, there are many patient websites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，还有很多患者网站。

examination_example.sentence: Most of these foods are freshly harvested (收获) with no man-made <highlight>additions</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些食物大多是新鲜收获的，没有人工添加剂。

examination_example.sentence: We can NOT infer (推断) grocery stores sell fresh and local food with no man-made <highlight>additions</highlight> from Paragraph 3.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不能从第3段推断杂货店出售没有人工添加剂的新鲜的本地食品。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight> to learning about the past, history teaching can help students to think for themselves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了学习过去，历史教学还可以帮助学生独立思考。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>addition</highlight> to its presence in China, Beijing Opera has spread to many other places.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了存在于中国，京剧还传播到了许多其他地方。
